name: Eon Reality, Inc.
description: Eon Reality, Inc. is a global leader in augmented and virtual reality (AR/VR) solutions, dedicated to enhancing the way people learn, train, and interact with information. Founded in 1999, Eon Reality has developed an extensive suite of software tools and applications that empower users to create, manage, and distribute immersive content across various sectors, including education, healthcare, and enterprise training. The company aims to democratize knowledge through its innovative AR/VR technologies, making advanced learning accessible to everyone. Eon Reality's flagship platform, the AVR Platform, combines AR and VR capabilities, allowing organizations to create highly interactive and engaging learning environments. They also provide a range of solutions tailored for specific industries, such as Eon-XR for education and Eon-AR for corporate training. With a commitment to driving technological advancements and improving user experience, Eon Reality is at the forefront of the AR/VR revolution, working with educational institutions, businesses, and governments to transform traditional learning methodologies into dynamic, interactive experiences. The company believes that immersive learning can significantly enhance retention and understanding, thereby preparing individuals for the challenges of the modern world.
